content.rendered:
• Custom assembled

    ULTRA

    FIND A RESELLER

  • C O L O R S

  • T E C H N I Q U E

Italian luxury meets true speed



Ultra Carbon is an extreme project, designed to overcome the limit that separates the world of bikes and motorcycles. Inside, everything is maximized, each component is made to withstand high speeds.

This, however, still allows for an obsessive attention to design and details, with the aim of creating an inimitable product. This is demonstrated by the fact that each Ultra Carbon is truly unique.

Each graphic is created personally in collaboration with the customer and can no longer be adopted by anyone else. This allows you to have a product that does not need a chassis number as its identity is defined by the chosen design.

Colors





Ultra Carbon was born as a unique product, made in extremely limited quantities and with graphics never seen before. Our designers, in collaboration with the customer, create a first sketch with the graphic proposal, and then proceed with the creation of a realistic render. Finally, the partnership with the best painters in the Motor Valley will allow us to obtain top quality paints, fully respecting the customer’s requests.



Data sheet



TELAIO / FORCELLA
TELAIO Carbonio e alluminio
TAGLIA Su misura
FRONT FORK Forcella a parallelogramma in Alluminio/Carbonio con ammortizzatore a molla
SOSPENSIONE POSTERIORE Forcellone in alluminio con cantilever con ammortizzatore a molla
AMMORTIZZATORE ANTERIORE CANE CREEK DBCOIL-IL – 190/45 – “FACTORY TUNE”
AMMORTIZZATORE POSTERIORE CANE CREEK DBCOIL-CS – 200/57 – “FACTORY TUNE”
VERNICIATURA Personalizzata
HANDSET/STEM/BAR
CANOTTO STERZO Regolabile 50mm Ergotec Up&Down Turn 3
MANUBRIO 780mm
MANOPOLE Velo VLG-884
PORTATELEFONO SP Connect Micro Stem Mount
DISPLAY Moto Parilla Display personalizzato con connessione Bluetooth + supporto telefono Quad Lock
FRENI
FRENO ANTERIORE Doppia pinza freno a Alligator Brakes edizione speciale ad 8 pistoncini / Doppio disco anteriore Moto Parilla da 380mm
FRENO POSTERIORE Pinza freno Alligator Brakes edizione speciale a 8 pistoncini / Disco Moto Parilla da 210mm
CAMBIO/TRASMISSIONE/PEDALI
CAMBIO DEL MOZZO Enviolo SP
CAMBIO Enviolo ONE TURN
PEDIVELLA Moto Parilla 160mm
PEDALI Pedali Xpedo in magnesio ultra light
RUOTE
MOZZO ANTERIORE Moto Parilla con supporto di grandi dimensioni per rotore anteriore
MOZZO POSTERIORE Integrato con ENVIOLO
CERCHI 26’x100 in alluminio
PNEUMATICI Vee Apache 26×4,50 Slick
SELLINO
SELLINO
 Fatto a mano in pura pelle
LUCI
LUCE ANTERIORE Spanninga AXENDO 40
LUCE POSTERIORE MOTO PARILLA Led alto raggio (incorporato nel telaio)
BATTERIA/DISPLAY
PORTA TELEFONO SP Connect Micro Stem Mount
DISPLAY Moto Parilla Display personalizzato con connessione Bluetooth + supporto telefono Quad Lock
BATTERIA Ioni di litio 52V- 17.5Ah – 910Wh
MOTORE
MOTORE Italiano
POTENZA 4000W – Eco 2000W
COPPIA 150Nm
VELOCITA’ N/A
PESO
PESO 51,5 Kg

Requests and orders


Use the form below to send us your request, whether it is a request for information or a purchase request. You will be contacted and in the event of a purchase request we will find the best solution, both in economic and logistical terms.
